author: perrotta
body:
It updates on top of #6152, i.e.
       - CMSHLT-130: HLT_MET75_IsoTrk50 (EXO)
       - Added paths to GRun from CMSHLT 89,96,121,123,128,130
       - CMSHLT-131: WenHbb trigger paths
       - CMSHLT-133: JETMet double jet triggers
       - CMSHLT-138: update of photon+jet control triggers
       - CMSHLT-140: high dxy versions of Displaced SUSY paths for EXO
       - CMSHLT-141 and CMSHLT-142: calo jets and diphoton triggers
       - Remove more MuXXNoFiltersNoVtx paths from the FastSim menus
with the additional
       - Updated prescales for CMSHLT-129
       - Preliminary prescales for CMSHLT-133
       -  Fix isoTag in cluster shape modules, CMSHLT-135
title: Piled up HLT updates, and fix of the isoTag in cluster shape modules
